websites.title: qr.me
websites.desc: qr.me is a minimalistic, easy to use and simply beautiful qr code generator with various features.

websites.title: ROD 1000
websites.desc: Websites made for family gardens in Poznan. Main features are: news feed, gallery and noticeboard.

websites.title: Prefdom
websites.desc: Website made for company that designs and builds green, enviromental friendly houses.

websites.title: MTD System
websites.desc: Website made for company that sells doors, windows and accessories for them.

games.title: Hit the Trump
games.desc: Can you beat the almighty Donald Trump? Find out now! It's totally free! Game made just to annoy my english teacher from USA. He didn't like it at all but my classmates enjoyed it!

games.title: Super epic buggy gggrasshopper
games.desc: A platform game made for 0h tram game jam 2014. Inspired by bugs, color of the tram and nature... but mostly bugs.

games.title: #WOUO
games.desc: A puzzle game made for Global Game Jam 2015 Theme of that GJ was"What do we do know?", so we made confusing puzzle game :D

games.title: Real Minesweeper
games.desc: An upgraded version of the old school minesweeper. Sound base bombs finding, more levels and map editor.

games.title: Millionaire
games.desc: Game made for P-Jam 2016. Theme of this game jam was: "It was just a dream". So we made a game about millionaire that kills corporats with coins and builds up the city infrastructure.

apps.title: Receipt Master
apps.desc: App for gathering, managing and keeping up to date receipts.

apps.title: Timetable generator
apps.desc: Simple app converting xml file with timetable data to pure html timetable.

apps.title: SortApp
apps.desc: Simple app measuring differences in various sort methods for varioius sequences and visualising it on a chart.
